Description:
Detects suspicious change of file privileges with chown and chmod commands

Author: Ömer Günal
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Setuid and Setgid
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%chown root%' and (command like '% chmod u+s%' or command like '% chmod g+s%'))
